The Kaohsiung Software Park (KSP; ) is an intelligent technology park located in Kaohsiung, Taiwan, focusing on the development of information software, digital video, and computer communication industries. It is within the Asia New Bay Area and neighbors the Kaohsiung Multi-functional Economic and Trade Park.
Located in the park
*Institute for Information Industry Southern Branch Office
*Ocean Affairs Council Headquarters
**Ocean Conservation Administration Headquarters
**National Academy of Marine Research
*Taiwan Carbon Solution Exchange
*Taipei-1 AI Supercomputer Advanced Computing Center, owned by Nvidia
Transportation
;Kaohsiung Metro
